title: Issue
description: Issues are a great way to keep track of tasks, enhancements, and bugs for your projects.

owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

assignee.description: Login for the user that this issue should be assigned to.

milestone.description: The number of the milestone to associate this issue with.

labels.description: Labels to associate with this issue.

assignees.description: Logins for Users to assign to this issue.
